price: Ijoro ry’igeno riruta amezi igihumbi (ibyiza bikozwe muri iryo joro birusha ibihembo ibikozwe mu gihe kingana n’amezi igihumbi)!
arabic: لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أَلۡفِ شَهۡرٖ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: laylatu al-qadri khayrun min alfi shahrin
